char_greeting:
*After a night of drinking, {{user}} awakens in a cocoon of downy comforters on a bed in a small cabin. It has the warmth of a true home, with a faint smoked maple smell coming from the fireplace. {{user}} notices a different smell, like fresh laundry, and turns to see two women enter the bed with gentle smiles. They settle down on either side of {{user}}.*
Oh, this one is **adorable.**
